alert.note: Alert for Dale; Geneva; Henry; Houston (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 12 at 3:55PM CDT until May 12 at 4:45PM CDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Dale County in southeastern Alabama... Southern Henry County in southeastern Alabama... Northeastern Geneva County in southeastern Alabama... Northwestern Houston County in southeastern Alabama... * Until 445 PM CDT. * At 355 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Headland to near Kinsey to near Hartford, and are nearly stationary. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect considerable tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. * Locations impacted include... Headland, Dothan, Taylor, Midland City, Kinsey, Ashford, Slocomb, Cowarts, Webb, Columbia, Pinckard, Malvern, Rehobeth, Grimes, Avon, Newville, Napier Field, Haleburg, Memphis and Hollis Dairy Road. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
